title: My Voice comms cut out
body:
I've used Skype and Discord.  After champ select when the loading screen comes up comms get so quite I everyone talking sounds like mumbles, 20-60 seconds later comms sound returns to normal level.  On Skype I'm able to talk and they can hear me, but on Discord I lose the ability to voice chat.  I can still hear them, but they can't hear me.
Any help with this would be great, thank you.

replies.body:
In this case, because this doesn't affect *all sounds* on your PC, it sounds like this is more an issue with Discord. My best guess is another background app is conflicting with it, and a [clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) may resolve this.

If the clean boot doesn't cause any change, you may want to [reach out to Discord](https://support.discordapp.com/hc/en-us) for assistance with troubleshooting this further.
